description: DynaCache is a small C# library that allows you to automatically cache the output from standard .NET functions. Although it is possible to use it without one, DynaCache works best when used in conjunction with a dependency injection (DI) framework, such as StructureMap, Ninject, etc.
releaseNotes:
Added ability to specify named cache durations in application configuration, e.g.: 
  <configSections>
    <section name="dynaCache" type="DynaCache.DynaCacheSection, DynaCache"/>
  </configSections>

  <dynaCache>
    <cacheDurations>
      <add name="short" duration="00:00:01" />
      <add name="long" duration="00:01:00" />
    </cacheDurations>
  </dynaCache>

Also tweaked how DateTime and DateTimeOffset parameters are recorded in cache keys to make them less prone to collision
summary: A simple but powerful API that allows you to create caching behaviours for classes
title: DynaCache - output caching for classes
